fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Pick a player, and generate a math problem. You must generate your own math problem, and you must show that you can solve it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the night, your target is given the math problem, and they have all night to complete it. They are also roleblocked.
- If they cannot solve it by the time all actions are in, or by the time night ends naturally - whichever comes first - they die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill two players with your ability.
